title: /api/data/features
description:
Return streaming Line-Delimited GeoJSON within the provided BBOX or Point

Note: All streaming GeoJSON endpoints will send the Unitcode End Of Transmission, EOT
(`0x04`) on stream completion. This can be used to ensure that a stream did not exit early.

parameters.name: bbox
parameters.description: Bounding box in format `left,bottom,right,top` or `minX, minY, maxX, maxY`

parameters.name: point
parameters.description: Retrieve all features that intersect point in format `Lng,Lat`
